name: Making the Perfect Wedding
summary: You are a strong, independent woman who plans weddings for the rich and famous.You love your job, except for the fact that male clients are constantly flirting with you. Uncomfortable encounters with men have left you skeptical about the idea of romance. One day, you receive a request from your ailing sister: “I want to see your wedding.” You have no intention of falling in love, but you also want to make your sister happy…
